comments.comments_text: Juventus take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence.

comments.comments_text: Fabio Miretti (Juventus) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Antonio Candreva (Salernitana) was in the right place to put the ball into the back of the net with his body. It's 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was in the right place to put the ball into the back of the net with his body. It's 0:1.

comments.comments_text: The goal stands! That took a long time for referee Matteo Marcenaro to decide. The relieved Salernitana players can finally celebrate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The goal stands! That took a long time for referee [REFEREE] to decide. The relieved [TEAM] players can finally celebrate.

comments.comments_text: Filip Kostic (Juventus) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

comments.comments_text: Filip Kostic (Juventus) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Giulio Maggiore (Salernitana) has tested the patience of referee Matteo Marcenaro and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: Bremer (Juventus) is literally asking for a yellow card with his behaviour. The referee agrees and books him. The ball spins up and hits the hand of Bremer (Juventus) after he fails to control it and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Krzysztof Piatek (Salernitana) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Mattia Perin into the bottom right corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past [PLAYER] into the bottom right corner.

comments.comments_text: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Massimiliano Allegri probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Moise Kean. He is replaced by Arkadiusz Milik (Juventus).

comments.comments_text: Bremer (Juventus) reacts well to a deflected cross from Filip Kostic and places a close-range header beyond the keeper into the roof of the net. 1:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) reacts well to a deflected cross from [PLAYER] and places a close-range header beyond the keeper into the roof of the net. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: The referee cannot ignore such behaviour. Federico Fazio (Salernitana) sees a yellow card and needs to watch himself for the rest of the game.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Krzysztof Piatek (Salernitana) was quite harsh and Matteo Marcenaro didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: This was really stupid from Arkadiusz Milik (Juventus)! He is booked for the second time today and is forced to leave the pitch after seeing a red card in the hand of Matteo Marcenaro.
